snippet.title: DAKAR 18 - CGI Trailer [IT]
snippet.description:
DAKAR 18 is aiming to be one of the biggest open worlds ever made in a racing game, coming to PlayStation®4, Xbox One and PC platforms in 2018. Based on the world famous annual rally raid organized by Amaury Sport Organisation (A.S.O.) in South America, DAKAR 18 is a realistic simulation of the biggest cross-country rally in the world and features a variety of vehicles, including motorcycles, cars, trucks, quads and SxS. Players will compete in fierce online multiplayer battles as well as playing offline to harness and grow racing skills. 

More information about the Dakar 18 can be found here on http://www.dakarthegame.com or https://www.facebook.com/dakarthegame information about the Dakar Rally is available here: http://www.dakar.com
